transcript:
Hello?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan, ma'am, maine aapki video dekh li hai. Actually na Saturday ko ye issue aa raha tha. Aap jo bol rahi hai na, theek hai? Ab aap ek kaam kariye, aap dobara se usko kijiye upload.
Customer: Maine apne se end se karke dekha, abhi ho raha hai proper upload.
Executive: Theek hai, main dekh rahi hu. Aap ek baar call pe dekhiye ma'am, ho raha hai ki nahi.

Executive: Agar desktop mein login hai IndiaMART, toh main waha se bhi guide karti hu aapko, waha se kaise hoga.
Customer: Nahi, mujhe mobile se hi karna hai.
Customer: Nahi, mere mein toh select nahi ho raha hai. Main screen recording bhejti hu wapas.
Executive: Ma'am, ek kaam kariye na, desktop mein open kariye IndiaMART aap. Main waha se guide karti hu aapko.
Customer: Har baar thodi mere paas desktop hota hai.
Executive: But filhaal ke liye toh aap
Customer: But jo app mein issue hai, uska kya karna hai?
Executive: Kiska?
Customer: App mein jo issue hai, uska kya karna hai?
Executive: Uska hum concern aage bhej dete hain hamari team ko. Ki app mein aapke paas login nahi hai website mein. Aur
Executive: Toh ma'am, main guide karu kaise login karna hai aapko?
Customer: Woh toh mujhe aata hai, but OTP kaha se aayega? Woh mobile abhi mere paas nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi jis humne call ons pe kiya tha na, 929 wala. Haan but unke paas one tha, woh toh le gaya.
Executive: Toh ek baar aap call karke OTP maang lena unse.
Customer: Possible nahi hai but woh.
Executive: Kyunki dekhiye, jo aapne mujhe phone ka issue bheja hai, abhi apne team ko bhej dete hain ki aapko agar abhi bhi woh dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Uske baad kya solution aata hai woh batao mujhe.
Executive: Toh ma'am, waha time lagega na, hum bhejenge waha se baat update aayegi. Haan toh uske baad main dekhti hu na, jo ticket hai na, usme bhi main daal deti hu. Phir se ek nayi screen recording daal deti hu. Aap mujhe jo bhi aage se answer aaye woh mujhe batana.
Executive: Ek kaam kariye na, agar login ho payega toh main website se try kar lungi. Haan, main aapko ek Google meeting ki link share karti hu, aap mujhe waha pe dikha dijiye phone mein abhi bhi woh issue aa raha hai. But OTP hi nahi aayega toh login kaha se karungi?
Executive: Phone mein, ma'am, phone mein. Main aapko ek Google meeting ki link bhej rahi hu. Aapko phone se karna hai join. Toh phone se aapko woh issue dikhana hai mujhe phone se hi.
Customer: Theek hai. No problem.
Executive: Theek hai. Aapke paas mail ID hai?
Customer: Registered mail ID jo IndiaMART par hai ki WhatsApp pe bhej dijiye?
Executive: Mujhe WhatsApp pe bhejo link. WhatsApp pe link bhejo.
Customer: Theek hai WhatsApp. Haan, bhejiye, join kariye.
Customer: Call cut karu?
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issue in uploading video.

- Customer unable to login due to OTP issue.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested uploading again.

- Executive offered guidance via desktop login.

- Executive offered Google Meet to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share Google Meet link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video upload, login issue, google meet, otp
